name: root
description: Top-level circuit with individual nets instead of buses

subcircuits.name: regulator
subcircuits.description:
A simple 3.3v regulator designed for 1A max current.
    Includes 10uF input and output capacitors.

U2.description: 1A Low drop-out regulator, Fixed Output 3.3V, SOT-223

annotations.text:
A simple 3.3v regulator designed for 1A max current.
    Includes 10uF input and output capacitors.

subcircuits.name: Comms_processor
subcircuits.description: Main processor (ESP32-S3) with individual nets for USB, SPI, and interrupts

U1.description: RF Module, ESP32-S3 SoC, Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n, Bluetooth, BLE, 32-bit, 3.3V, SMD, onboard antenna

subcircuits.name: Debug_Header
subcircuits.description: Debug header connections using individual nets

J1.description: Generic connector, double row, 02x03, odd/even pin numbering scheme (row 1 odd numbers, row 2 even numbers), script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)

annotations.text: Debug header connections using individual nets

subcircuits.name: HW_version
subcircuits.description:
A simple resistor divider to set the HW version.
    Uses two 10K resistors from 3.3V -> HW_VER -> GND.

annotations.text:
A simple resistor divider to set the HW version.
    Uses two 10K resistors from 3.3V -> HW_VER -> GND.
Main processor (ESP32-S3) with individual nets for USB, SPI, and interrupts

subcircuits.name: USB_Port
subcircuits.description:
USB-C port with in-line 22Ω resistors, ESD diodes,
    CC resistor to GND, and ESD diode on 5V rail.
    Uses individual nets for D+/D-.

annotations.text:
USB-C port with in-line 22Ω resistors, ESD diodes,
    CC resistor to GND, and ESD diode on 5V rail.
    Uses individual nets for D+/D-.

subcircuits.name: IMU_Circuit
subcircuits.description: LSM6DSL IMU circuit using SPI interface and interrupt pins.

U3.description: I2C/SPI, iNEMO inertial module: always-on 3D accelerometer and 3D gyroscope, 1.71V to 3.6V VCC

annotations.text: LSM6DSL IMU circuit using SPI interface and interrupt pins.
Top-level circuit with individual nets instead of buses
